id.description: The unique identifier for an experience

name.title: The experience's name/identifier
name.description: The experience's name will be used internally as a folder name in the Gallery.

author.title: The experience's current author
author.description: A person currently contributing the most to the experience.

license.title: The experience's license
license.description: Currently only MIT is accepted, although more licenses will be available after alpha.

title.title: The human-friendly experience's name
title.description: The experience title will be displayed in the Gallery.

description.title: The experience's description
description.description: It helps people understand what the experience provides. It will be displayed in the Gallery.

screenshots.title: The list of experience's screenshots
screenshots.description: Screenshots of the experience. They will be displayed in the Gallery.

downloadLink.title: The experience's download link
downloadLink.description: The link to the experience's download file.

contributors.title: The experience's list of contributors
contributors.description: People who have meaningfully contributed to the experience.
